display_long_description:
In Voidcleaver, you can become the hero you never thought you could be!

To defend your people against the mighty emperor Xerathos and the Xeridian army, you’ll have to master the Voidcleaver. This alien weapon mutates into different forms and shapes to destroy your enemy’s troops.

You will be immersed in a virtual reality adventure to face your opponent’s attacks and move your body to strike, dodge, and deflect menacing projectiles fired at you while trying to reach the resistance stronghold on Paragon.

The game has 11 levels in its early access version and will challenge you until you strike a final blow to tanks, warships, drones, and alien creatures.
Face your fears in this arcade story-based adventure-style game and see if you can reach the final epic battle with the XT Aracno, where all your acquired skills will be tested.

Are you ready to give birth to your inner hero and conquer the first part of the Voidcleaver Legacy?
